#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

vector <string> names;
vector <int> sind;

bool Less(const int &a, const int &b)
{
     return names[a] < names[b];
}

int main()
{
    int n, maxl, nwbest, best = 0;
    string s;
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cin >> s; names.push_back(s);
        sind.push_back(i);
    }
    sort(sind.begin(), sind.end(), Less);
    for (int i = 0; i+1 < n; i++) {
        maxl = min(names[sind[i]].length(), names[sind[i+1]].length());
        for (nwbest = 0; nwbest < maxl; nwbest++) 
           if (names[sind[i]][nwbest] != names[sind[i+1]][nwbest]) break;
        if (nwbest > best) best = nwbest; 
    }
    cout << best << endl;
    return 0;
}
